mapper.update: update moneyrecords set money_cost = #{moneyCost,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, money_left = #{moneyLeft,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, money_date = #{moneyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, money_reason = #{moneyReason,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where money_id = #{moneyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select money_id, money_cost, money_left, money_date, type, money_reason from moneyrecords
SELECT money_left FROM eaas.moneyrecords where money_id = (select max(money_id) from eaas.moneyrecords)
